title: Anyone getting massive frame drops in 7.16?!
body: I get sudden frame drops and that's right when the client updated to 7.16, I know it's not my computer's hardware because it's new and of high tech, though with stock intel graphics I was able(and still am) to play smoothly on high settings, it's just sudden frame drops that I get even when my camera isn't focusing on anything but the dark unexplored jungle. If anyone knows a solution to this, or know if anyone else is also getting this problem, it will help a lot if you told me because I submitted a ticket to Riot Support but they only say it's my hardware.

replies.body:
I wonder if this might be happening due to all of the new Arcade assets on SR? Let's try disabling that really quickly and testing it in a custom or practice match, and let me know if that helps!

https://i.gyazo.com/b67ce700a83be1d597d3148c9a0fc9c0.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=We7Pbiyw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-11T20:34:46.689+0000)
>
> I wonder if this might be happening due to all of the new Arcade assets on SR? Let's try disabling that really quickly and testing it in a custom or practice match, and let me know if that helps!
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/b67ce700a83be1d597d3148c9a0fc9c0.png

Hello, sorry for the late reply but yes, it was because of all the Arcade assets, it was horrible but after the patch it fixed on its own. My problem was that the support team did not want to admit that this was causing the problem so they were looking away from it and telling me that it must have been smething else. Thaks anyways,
